programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock Her Phone: She Has A Double Life/ Family In Crisis: Mom Abandoned Me
programme.desc: Dwayne believes that his wife exhibits suspicious behavior. He thinks it’s because she is cheating on him.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Cheating Husband Went Viral
programme.desc: Shamika’s video went viral after she caught her husband at a hotel with another woman on their anniversary!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Is It A Break Or A Break-Up?
programme.desc: Jalen and Olivia met in college and have been together ever since, but there’s been a strain as of late.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock the Phone: Your Mistress Video Called Me; Unlock the Truth: I'm Not Lying About My Illness
programme.desc: An app proves that Alisha's boyfriend is cheating on her, while he contends that she is the one who needs to be tracked; Quan's wife and twin brother wonder if he is faking a mysterious illness for attention, so Karamo issues a lie-detector test.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: My Daughter Needs Her Dad; Unlock: The Naked Truth
programme.desc: Aysa says that her daughter's dad went from her first love to a deadbeat; Erica has been dating Devon for two years but she doesn't know where he works or lives; she wants to unlock his phone to find out.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: Is It More Than Flirting? / DNA & Unlock: Your Insecurity Is Ruining Our Family
programme.desc: Today on Karamo, Brittany says she can’t be in the same room with another man without being accused of cheating by her fiancé, K’Wasi. Next, Ebony’s boyfriend Johnny is non-stop with his accusations of her cheating. He’s even set hidden cameras up.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Mom And Daughter In Distress
programme.desc: Latrice believes that her daughter, Kyeshi’s reckless behavior is tearing her family asunder!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I Was Date Raped and Can’t Trust / Unlock The Phone: Who Is Sending Those Messages?
programme.desc: Isiah argues with his girlfriend Marilyn often about her flirtatious ways!

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Three Sisters in Crisis
programme.desc: Jazmine, Jenny and Janey are here hoping to repair the scar tissue from some very deep wounds.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock: You Still Want Her?!; Help Me With My 13-Year-Old Daughter
programme.desc: Luis believes that his girlfriend is having an affair with her ex; Brandy's sister told Brandy's child's father that their baby isn't his.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: We're Triplets...Did My Husband Cheat With Both of My Sisters?
programme.desc: Did Tu’Shaun cheat on Nette with her sisters? Sister Bobbie has a shocking confession that could threaten both Nette’s relationship with her man and both of her sisters! Then, triplet Alisha fears that her husband is sleeping with her 2 sisters!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Train Her Like a Dog... Abusive Men Confronted!
programme.desc: Bob demands to be called Big Daddy, by his girlfriend Regina. He is abusive and treats her like his property. Next, Michael is engaged to Charity and he treats her like a dog. Then, LaToya's fiancé Anthony says all men are kings and women need to submit to them.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 2 Women…3 Babies…Is My Deceased Son the Father?
programme.desc: These women are here to find out once and for all who the fathers of their children really are. But these men won't step up and take responsibility until they know for sure that the kids belong to them.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: 3 Women ... 4 Babies ... Is Edwin The Father?
programme.desc: Ashley, Ramzia and Latrice are 3 women with one mission. They're here to prove to one man, Edwin, that he is the father of all 4 of their children. They say they're desperate for support and that they can't raise their children alone.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Jack Hanna's Spring Break Safari!
programme.desc: Special guest, "Jungle" Jack Hanna makes an appearance with some of his favorite furry friends to help ring in the spring season! You'll see some wild animals like you've never seen before on this episode the whole family is sure to love.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm Only 16 ... I Need to Prove You're My Baby's Father!
programme.desc: The moment Jasmine told BJ she was pregnant she found out he had a fiancé. Now both of them deny that he is father. Then, Alasha is only 16 years old and raising a child on her own. She says ellis is the father but he thinks someone else is

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: Sex Secrets Revealed ... Your Boyfriend Got Me Pregnant
programme.desc: Alycia returns with shocking lie-detector results. Ashley suspects husband's infidelity from a dream. Terrance denies, offers test. Paige questions fiancé's fidelity.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm 25… DNA Will Prove this 50 Year Old is my Baby's Dad
programme.desc: Will 25 year old Katrina prove that 50 year old Christopher fathered her baby and silence his new fiancé?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.sub-title: I'm 25… DNA Will Prove this 50 Year Old is my Baby's Dad
programme.desc: Will 25 year old Katrina prove that 50 year old Christopher fathered her baby and silence his new fiancé?

programme.title: The Maury Show
programme.sub-title: I'm 25… DNA Will Prove this 50 Year Old is my Baby's Dad
programme.desc: Will 25 year old Katrina prove that 50 year old Christopher fathered her baby and silence his new fiancé?

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I'm 44...Is my 21 Year Old Wife Cheating on Me Again?
programme.desc: Montrice doesn’t feel bad for keeping mum about whose man she’s been sleeping with. Plus, Amber thinks Shawn is sleeping with her sister! A 48-year old will confront her 51-year-old best friend that she’s sleeping with her 21-year old man!

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: We're 15, 16, and 17 … Are You Our Babies Father?
programme.desc: Tameeka was thrilled to be pregnant, until she found out Brandon was married. Then, Amanda, age 15, says Anthony is the father but he denies it. Later, John says there is no way he is the father because she's been sleeping with his teenage son.

programme.title: Maury
programme.sub-title: I Prostituted and Cheated 300 Times!
programme.desc: Josh is the jealous type and can't get over his fear that his girlfriend Nicole is cheating on him. When the results of Nicole's lie detector test come in, will Josh be proven wrong or will his worst fears be confirmed.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Party Pooper
programme.desc: Neil Sattar claims the defendant hired him to DJ and. Photograph a Sweet 16 party and everyone had a rocking time - and he has the photos to prove it. The defendant, Janeen, says the sneaky plaintiff negotiated a separate deal on the side, for clicking pictures at the party, when he was only hired to DJ the event, and has been harassing her staff mercilessly. He’s not going to allow her to get away with not paying him and is suing for everything he’s owed from this party pooper.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Roommate Sex Refusal
programme.desc: Rachael sues ex-roommate Jean for $750 after he gave her a bounced check for her security deposit. She claims he caused chaos by moving 15 people in, while he accuses her of theft and promiscuity. Both bring explosive allegations to court.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Harassed by Her Boss?
programme.desc: Corinne sues ex-boss Walter for $5,000, claiming unpaid wages, harassment, and abuse. Walter denies the claims, asserting he paid her and countersues for $545.04, accusing her of a shakedown.

programme.title: The People's Court
programme.sub-title: Your Dog Took a Chunk out of My Finger!
programme.desc: Shawn sues Andrew for $4,545, claiming Andrew's dog bit him, injuring his finger and knuckle. Andrew argues Shawn's unleashed dog started the scuffle and insists Shawn's own dog caused the bite.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Ultimatum: Invest In Our Future Or No Baby
programme.desc: Aledia thought Sheilyn was her ride or die until one night, Sheilyn watched her get tossed out of a club.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Show Me The Proof!
programme.desc: Karamo helps Diamond dig deep after feeling caught in the middle of her parents who argue over everything.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: I'm 17, Are You My Daddy?
programme.desc: Keyonna was just 15 years young when she had her daughter, and she believes Rashard is the father.

programme.title: Karamo
programme.sub-title: Unlock The Phone: How Many Times?/ My Daughters Are Monsters
programme.desc: Josh believes that his fiancée, Jessica entertains men while he’s away on business.
